visualization_prompt: Generate a spline chart showing temporal trends of Google searches for vitamin D using CSV data from 2004-2022 with datetime axis formatting
visualization_explanation: The dataset contains two-dimensional time series data with a datetime index (2004-2022) and normalized search interest values (0-100 scale). Using direct CSV sourcing ensures data integrity from Google Trends' official methodology. The spline chart's curved interpolation effectively reveals multi-year seasonal patterns while maintaining temporal precision. Disabled markers and a single line color maximize data-ink ratio per Tufte's principles. The 0-100 anchored scale enables direct interpretation of relative popularity, while %Y axis labeling and YYYY-MM tooltips create temporal orientation through Cairo's perceptual salience. Formatting choices like muted axis colors and removed legend focus attention on the primary trend line.
